subtitle: when we turn our awareness to that
Divine fire we find that it is so great
just as the sun is that it is often
considered impossible for us to truly
comprehend and perceive as it is written
in the hermetica the imperfect and
impermanent cannot easily apprehend the
eternally perfected
we might liken this to staring at the
sun in broad daylight which can destroy
our retinas and if we remain for too
long burn our skin
yet it is that same very power that
keeps our planet alive and thriving in
the same way it is said that God's power
is so great that he would burn us to
dust if we were to behold his Supreme
Majesty at the very least without having
a full initiation in order to receive
that Supreme light within us
yet every day as we grow closer to the
father we therein continue to purify
ourselves and become capable of
receiving and emanating that much more
Divine Light
